channel.title: Slowing down range?
channel.description: How can i do this please help :)

item.title: Slowing down range?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Search for

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4212)

you should see this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4212)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

PkingDelay is how fast it hits in wild, wepdelay is how fast it hits outside of wild, 2 represents secounds I beleiveâ€¦ Change to your likeing
Edit everything down from that number to make all bows hit slower, you should see more codes such as these

/*
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214)
{
 PkingDelay = 1;
 wepdelay = 1;
 UseBow = true; 
}
	
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)
{
 PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true; 
}
								                                                        
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859)
{
 PkingDelay = 3;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;                                                                               
}
*/

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4212)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2883)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6082)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 767)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859)
{
PkingDelay = 2;
 wepdelay = 2;
 UseBow = true;
}


if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841  || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857)
{
  PkingDelay = 4;
  wepdelay = 4;
  UseBow = true;
}
